attributes.action: Resign Now Before He Does Any More Harm To The Labour Party
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As somebody who has voted labour nationally for many years it is sad and discouraging to see such harm being done to the office of Prime Minister by a man who is blatantly unable to match up to such a responsibility.  

In resent times we have seen his decisions cost the British taxpayer dearly both in terms of loss to themselves and loss to the economy. 

His lack of direction and inability to lead has caused the Labour party and its voters to lose confidence in him.

We put it to Gordon Brown, act with dignity and resign your post and accept that the British Public never voted you in to be PM and that they are now actively pressing for your departure by their failure in supporting the Labour party in general.

Signed
PG.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
